author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Coronavirus: Oprah warns black Americans about outbreak
description: The broadcaster and TV personality warns African-Americans they must take the outbreak seriously.
content:
Image copyrightReuters
American broadcaster Oprah Winfrey has warned African Americans to take the coronavirus outbreak seriously, saying the disease is "taking people out".
The virus was hitting the black community hard, and "people aren't getting the mess… [+2968 chars]
